评论详情: My wife flies to Arizona a couple times a year. I've finally convinced her to ONLY bring a carry on bag to save a headache and this is the bag she chose. It has tons of pockets and a spot to put a battery to plug her phone in and charge it. I have a few of those batteries so she's set now. Her favorite color is purple so she loves the bag. Anything that won't fit the bag we mail ahead so she has what she needs. Thats the way to travel!!
Great for the office and packing my laptop along with notebooks ect and love the charging feature

评论概述: They send something that doesn't look like the photo
评论详情: While the product seems sturdy, the zippers are a gody gold that looks cheap and cheesy. I'm sending it back, but would like to note that when I pay $50+ and wait two weeks for a product, I hope to receive what I bought.

Love this book bag so much!! I ordered it for my senior year of college and there is so much room for books, my laptop, chargers, snacks, and sooo much more. I’ve gotten many compliments on this bad and now that I’ve graduated I use it for all my shorter trips and still bring it along on my longer trips. So cute.
This product is quite sturdy and looks clean all the time.  Easy wipe off fabric.

This backpack looks very sophisticated and it holds so much! I needed a new bag that could easily hold my lunch along with my everyday items and this one does that with room to spare. The zippers do feel a little flimsy so I worry about how long they will last. Also wish the back had padding so you don’t feel books and things hitting your back.

I have had a lot of backpacks but this is by far the best. I needed something for work where I could take a laptop, charging cords, notebooks, personal items, and more it had more pockets than any bag I’ve used, the shoulder strap are nice and wide and economically shaped for comfort. It’s a sheek color. I would suggest this to anyone who needs space, style, and comfort

Bought this travel ad my personal item while flying. Perfect size and so much storage. There are so many compartments making organizing easy. I like the security zipper lock on the main compartment where you would store a laptop. Also comes with a strap to secure to handle on carry on luggage while roaming airport.
In love if you can't tell lol quality is amazing def buying more products !
Christmas gift for my niece. This back back is attractive, strong and nicely made. Very roomy.  I know she is going to love it.  👍👍
A lot nicer than I thought it was going to be. Great material.
This holds everything I need going back and forth to work.

评论概述: Fabulous Professional Looking and Heavy Duty Bag
评论详情: As a lawyer, I'm always carting around heavy A4 documents, laptop, stapler, lunch, and so many other things! I have been able to leave my litigation bag behind (heavy to carry up and down subway steps due to the wheels). I have had it for 13 months and use it EVERY DAY because I carry it daily as a handbag (pocketbook)!! It is still going STRONG and im back today to buy 2 more - a different color for myself and one for my sister who hasn't found a good bag to carry around her 3-years-old's and her stuff. I bought the Black & white bag. I got a similar-looking one from Temu first, but on Day 1, my pens were dropping out from the bottom of the side pocket as I walked, due to thin material and stitching.  Note: The look when carrying it is not squared out, but bulges according to what you have in it. Also, it will droop when carrying it on your shoulder full and heavy, because the only long straps for that are the backpack straps, so either use it fully as a backpack or manage it lopsided toting it around with one backpack strap. You have choices and even one strap is sturdy enough for the whole bag. BUY IT!!
This is an adorable bag with a lot of pockets. However, it doesn’t hold much though. When using one pocket- it makes another pocket unable to be used.

If you are looking for a wonder computer bag that’s good quality, nice zippers that don’t get stuck get this bad! The price was affordable and there is tons of space!! Everyone compliments my bag at my office!
I took this on a vacation and used it as my carry-on. I loaded this with snacks. A change of clothing, personal items and books. It was easy to carry and looks good too.
SO MANY POCKETS! I love it!
Exactly as expected. Gorgeous and stylish.

I used this recently as my personal item on a flight. I was able to fit my laptop, charger, a notebook, plus a sweatshirt, sneakers, a quart size bag of liquid toiletries, a few snacks, wallet, keys, phone. Oh, AND a blowdrying brush. It looks really nice, tons of pockets too!
Love the top handles and the backpack option. Great colors (green) bold and very durable.

I went form a tote style laptop bag to this backpack style bag. I am pleased with amount of pockets. It allows me to be much more organized than with the tote bag. I am able to find and store items quickly. the padded  straps are comfortable. The double handle on top feel very durable. I have a lot of items in my bag and it still have room for more. I highly recommend!
This backpack fits my 17 inch laptop perfectly and has so many pockets to put all of my stuff! I love the color and so far it seems to be well made and durable.

It’s a beauty. Strong, easy to clean. Matches well with most of my outfits. Great purchase - I am well pleased. This brand has some great picks. I got another one of their bags ( backpack purse ) and that’s a beauty too - compliments 😉
I love this bag! It’s cute, is made with a nice material (easy to clean), and has a lot of pockets!
Super cute great quality but after a few months the zipper broke in the front but it’s still a super cute functional bag

The bag its self is beautiful, I love the color scheme. I I can fit all of my stuff in basically 1-2 pockets and I still have about 8 pockets empty that I can use for anything!! Very good quality, can fit my 40oz water bottle in the pocket, charging port works amazing charges my phone quickly, light weight! The storage is absolutely amazing!

I really like the design and the pockets of this backpack, but unfortunately the overall quality is really lacking. The security zipper on the main compartment broke within the first week of use. Now after less than two months of use for my daily commuting and shopping, the fabric on the outside bottom of the bag is starting to separate from the seams and is forming two separate holes. I didn't expect the bag to last years but I did expect it to last more than a couple of months. I'm really disappointed because this bag has a lot of great features and is very attractive and comfortable, but the fabric is just subpar. I've purchased cheaper backpacks that are still perfectly intact after years of use.
Super cute and great quality, I’m loving it!
Love, love, LOVE this backpack! It's so spacious, it's more than I probably need and I love all the different compartments!

I use this as a work bag. I like the color scheme a lot , the color block of the brown ( yellow / golden undertone) , black , with the gold hardware i, makes the bag look appealing. I have made several Lovevook bag purchases it doesn’t disappoint. I compared the size to another Lovevook bag . There is a  lot of storage storage space for the items I carry it to work , I’m in healthcare , I can fit my medium size lunch box in the bag too.The quality of the bag is durable, the material is the average backpack material ; but the material is thick which is a good thing . The bag it’s not heavy in my opinion. There is a combination lock , that comes with instructions . The functionality of the bag is great ! Lovevook please make more bags with this color scheme!!!

Ive had this back pack for less then a year, I am a high school student and use it everyday. It ripped on the top seam and there is a big hole and the pockets and threads are coming out, and the external charging port fell out within a week or so. While it has tons of pockets and compartments I recommend spending the money to get a better quality one.
Works great for my 13 year old who stuffs it full!
Daughter loves this / alot of pockets. I just don't think it's sturdy enough.
I was so excited for this backpack and it looks nothing like the picture. The structure and colors are all wrong. Highly disappointed and will be returning
Everything seems to fit in it and it’s comfortable to carry weight. Plenty of pockets.
10\10! It has a lot of storage and very cute. I use it for work.

This bag is a lifesaver for my work and personal laptops and yes I do take both with me. I needed something that wouldn't sag and cause me arm/shoulder pain when carrying and this did the job. What I love most is all of the pockets. Some pockets are hidden and it has an accessible charger for you to hookup also. I opted for the black and tan color and it just goes with everything, definitely worth the buy.

评论概述: The amount of space and pockets is great.

评论详情: It held all of my electronics and personal stuff and the straps were comfortable. Comfort was a high priority because I am a senior woman.
My daughter loves this as her new school backpack

his bag is a perfect teacher bag! It offers an impressive array of pockets and compartments, making it incredibly easy to stay organized. From the spacious main section for books and binders to the dedicated pockets for pens, a laptop, and even a water bottle, this bag has thought of everything. The durable design ensures it can withstand the daily hustle of school life, while the comfortable straps make it easy to carry, even when fully loaded. If you’re a teacher looking for the perfect blend of functionality and style, this bag is a must-have!

I originally purchased this bag because it had next day delivery, I was not expecting to love it so much! Having only done little research, I was pleasantly surprised with the design, endless pockets, and unique details (small zipper pocket on the back for keys, luggage strap, top handle button closure, etc). The colors are great for both work and play. The shoulder straps are also padded and have a wide range to be adjusted for a perfect fit. I’ve had it for about a month now and am very happy with it.

I love a good bag with lots of compartments for organization, and this one is no exception. Sturdy, stylish and cleverly designed, I highly recommend! This is not the first product of this brand I’ve bought and I’ve been pleased each time.

This brand is really, really good. I was concerned about the handles sticking up too far as others have mentioned in the reviews but I decided to take a chance because I needed it for a recent trip and didn't have time to go shopping. The handles were fine and didn't get in my way at all. This bag holds the same amount of things as a carry on! Just know that if you fill it, it is rather heavy, but you can use it as a backpack, or carry it like a purse. I like the versatility and it looks much nicer than a typical backpack. It fits easily in carry on space on the plane.
It is the perfect backpack for school. It can fit all of my books. It is huge.

Super cute, fits even my keyboard with plenty of room for anything else I could want has a pocket big enough on the side for my big water bottle and super comfortable to wear walking around for work and yet still looks professional. This bag is the best!

Love this bag! It has so many different compartments! It’s cute & I was able to fit my laptop and so many other items in the bad without it being heavy! Super lightweight and comfortable for me to carry around! The quality is well made zippers work nice and if it was to get dirty, it would be easy to clean but it even came with a bag cover :)
This bag is lightweight (one reason I purchased it) spacious, but not humongous - comfortable and attractive. It has multiple compartments, allowing me to keep items organized. Glad I purchased it!

评论概述: Roomy, with lots of pockets, and stylish to boot. My daughter loves it.

I'll try to update this review in 6 months after she's put some wear and tear on the backpack.

I am so impressed with this backpack. It is great quality, there are so many pockets to keep it organized. It fits multiple laptops along with soooo many other things. I love the two different carrying straps and the luggage strap as well. Highly reccomend.

Love this backpack!! Comfortable and perfect size for everyday use!! I get loads of compliments when I am out in public with this bag.
Great quality and plenty of space!

Used this on a recent trip because Im attending school online and needed to bring my laptop. i never worried about the safety of my electronics. Has so many pockets for chargers, cords , smaller electronics ( brought my Kindle for reading as well.  theres an access hole to pull your USB cord through that is attached to a power bank inside the backpack . Love the color, very stylish compared to other laptop bags . A lady on the plane sitting on the plane next to me had the exact one but larger, and it still fit under her seat .

I love this backpack.  It holds so so much stuff, it is durable and well made as well.  I got it for half off so i think it was $22 or so.  Absolutely 100% worth the price.  I even bought more for travel as well.
I wanted this backpack for my work laptop. I love all the pockets with zippers and space it has. It's also very cute and durable.
I love this backpack as is fits my laptop, iPad and also a large book.

I got this bag as an alternative to a heavy leather purse. I needed something more practical for attending meetings. This has a lot of pockets! Ideal for the organized person on the go. Very easy to keep from getting junky because there are several options for storage. The look and quality is good. I really wanted the yellow and navy but it would have been 2 months before it arrived. The only thing I don’t love so far is that it is not machine washable from what I read on the tag.

I absolutely love the color and style of this backpack. I literally have a spot to hold basically everything from my laptop, charger, phones, keys, hand sanitizer, lip chap, writing utensils, lotion, wireless mouse pad and so on. Love it. Fits my laptop and ipad and everything I need. Would def recommend
Very lovely and classy!! Lots of pockets.
My daughter absolutely loves this bag! The size is great and it has a ton of compartments for storage.

great quality, using for work/personal travel.

评论详情: This bag is perfect for my needs. There are so many pockets that I might forget where everything is! The only thing missing is a loop for attaching keys. I've added one myself. It's just perfect.

I purchased this as a replacement for my old work bag, which was the typical satchel type of bag. This bag holds a lot more than you would think it would. My laptop fits perfectly a three ring binder fits well I shove a lot of stuff in there.

I like the color and quality. I needed an update for a work bag and this was perfect, fits everything I need and more. Some many pockets.

I AM YELLING THIS REVIEW BECAUSE I LOVE THIS BACKPACK SO MUCH!!!! SERIOUSLY THO, it's the perfect size for my laptop and notebooks. 评论概述: Great quality for a good price!
评论详情: This backpack is very nice looking. It has lots of pockets. There is one pocket sort of hidden that will face your back when you're wearing it.  The main compartment has a combination lock that you set with your own personal code of your choice.
Such a nice bag but of course the lock is not opening per the instructions left. Having to get a replacement but frustrated with the whole ordeal.

This bag is perfect for teaching... not too big, not too small. Padded laptop. PLENTY of pockets. The zippers on the main part of the backpack even have a clasp mechanism so that you could add your keychain, hand sanitizer, etc. right to them. So convenient. The quality is surprisingly good, too with a sturdy material all around! I'm very impressed with this bag. It looks super trendy, too with the color scheme.
